title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Meriwether Lewis Information CabinThe Information Cabin is currently closed.Located at Milepost 385.9, near Hohenwald, Tennessee. Hours: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday noon to 4:30 pm central time.            Saturday and Sunday 9 am to 4:30 pm central time.            Monday and Tuesday closed.    Parkway Visitor Center  Located at Milepost 266, Tupelo, Mississippi. Hours: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm central time. Open daily except for December 25. Call 1-800-305-7417 or 662-680-4027  Parkway Information Cabin  Located at Milepost 102.4, near Ridgeland, Mississippi.Hours 9:00 am to 4:00 pm central time, Fridays and Saturdays.  Mount Locust Historic Inn  Located at Milepost 15.5, near Natchez, Mississippi. Hours: 9:00 am to 4:30 pm central time. Open daily except for December 25.
